channel.title: Earley on A Parsing Toolbox in Go
channel.description: Recent content in Earley on A Parsing Toolbox in Go

item.title: Parsing MetaPost
item.description: These days I spend some evenings programming a variant of MetaPost, a DSL for diagrams and illustrations. MetaPost inherits much of its syntax from MetaFont, which has been designed by D. E. Knuth. Mr Knuth is the “father of LR-parsing,” so one would expect some interesting language features in MetaPost—and we are not disappointed!
